meanings: nhận vào, cho vào, kết hợp
examples: She admitted her mistake.
He was admitted to the university.

meanings: nhận làm con nuôi, bố mẹ nuôi
examples: They decided to adopt a child.
She adopted a new approach to teaching.

meanings: người lớn, người trưởng thành, trưởng thành
examples: He is an adult now.
The book is for adult readers.

meanings: sự tiến bộ, tiến lên; đưa lên, đề xuất
examples: The advance in technology is remarkable.
She advanced her career through hard work.

meanings: tiên tiến, tiến bộ, cấp cao. in advance trước, sớm
examples: He is taking an advanced course in mathematics.
Please notify us in advance.

meanings: sự thuận lợi, lợi ích, lợi thế. take advantage of lợi dụng
examples: He has the advantage of experience.
She took advantage of the opportunity.
They went on an adventure in the mountains.
The book is about a thrilling adventure.

meanings: báo cho biết, báo cho biết trước
examples: They advertised the event on social media.
The company advertised for a new manager.
The advertisement was very effective.
She saw an advertisement for a new car.

meanings: sự quảng cáo, nghề quảng cáo
examples: He works in advertising.
The company spends a lot on advertising.
She gave me some good advice.
He asked for advice on the matter.
She advised him to see a doctor.
He advised against taking the risk.
The affair was kept secret.
She handled the affair with discretion.

meanings: làm ảnh hưởng, tác động đến
examples: The weather can affect your mood.
The new law will affect many people.
She has a deep affection for her family.
He showed his affection by giving her flowers.

meanings: có thể, có đủ khả năng, điều kiện (làm gì)
examples: She can't afford to buy a new car.
He can afford to take a vacation.
She is afraid of spiders.
He was afraid to speak in public.
She went home after the meeting.
He arrived after she left.
She has a meeting in the afternoon.
They went for a walk in the afternoon.

meanings: sau này, về sau, rồi thì, sau đây
examples: We went to the cinema and afterwards we had dinner.
She felt better afterwards.
She tried again and succeeded.
He will visit us again next week.
They are against the new policy.
She leaned against the wall.
She is 30 years of age.
Age is just a number.
He has aged well.
The wine is aged for several years.

meanings: tác dụng, lực; môi giới, trung gian
examples: She works for a travel agency.
The agency handles all our advertising.
He is a real estate agent.
The agent negotiated the deal.

meanings: xâm lược, hung hăng (US: xông xáo)
examples: He has an aggressive personality.
The company is pursuing an aggressive marketing strategy.
She moved here two years ago.
Long ago, people lived in caves.
They agreed to the terms.
I agree with your opinion.

meanings: sự đồng ý, tán thành; hiệp định, hợp đồng
examples: They reached an agreement.
The agreement was signed yesterday.
The road ahead is clear.
She has a bright future ahead.

meanings: sự giúp đỡ; thêm vào, phụ vào
examples: They provided aid to the victims.
He aided her in the project.

meanings: sự nhắm (bắn), mục tiêu, ý định; nhắm, tập trung, hướng vào
examples: Her aim is to become a doctor.
He aimed the gun at the target.

meanings: không khí, bầu không khí, không gian
examples: The air is fresh and clean.
She loves the open air.
The aircraft landed safely.
He is a pilot of a commercial aircraft.
She arrived at the airport early.
The airport is very busy.
The alarm went off at 6 AM.
He was alarmed by the news.
She was alarmed by the sudden noise.
He looked alarmed.

meanings: làm lo sợ, làm hốt hoảng, làm sợ hãi
examples: The news is alarming.
There is an alarming increase in crime.
He doesn't drink alcohol.
Alcohol can be harmful to your health.
He is an alcoholic.
She avoids alcoholic beverages.

meanings: sống, vẫn còn sống, còn tồn tại
examples: She is alive and well.
The city comes alive at night.
All the students passed the exam.
She gave her all to the project.
Everything is all right.
She is feeling all right now.

meanings: liên minh, đồng minh, thông gia
examples: The allied forces won the battle.
They are allied in their efforts.
She allowed him to go out.
They don't allow smoking in the building.
